name: Shroud of Darkness
components: V, S, M/DF (a pinch of black sand)
text: With a dark incantation and a gesture of your hand over your eyes, you cause a shroud of darkness to descend upon the targets of this spell. The subjects treat the light level as two steps lower than normal for the duration of this spell. Bright light becomes dim light, normal light becomes darkness, and areas of dim light and darkness become supernaturally dark (as darkness, but even creatures with darkvision cannot see).
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料/法器（一撮黑色的沙子）
target_zh: 一名生物/3等级，任意两者之间的距离不超过30尺
text_zh: 伴随着黑色的符咒以及你以手捂眼的做势，你会使一层黑暗笼罩着该法术的目标。在这道法术的持续时间内，目标将光照等级视为比正常水平低2级。强光会变成昏暗，常光会变成黑暗，而黑暗则变成超自然黑暗（如同黑暗术，但即便是拥有黑暗视觉的生物也无法视物）。
